title: Mother of murdered Brianna Ghey urges Starmer to ban social media for under-16s
description: Esther Ghey says daughter’s eating disorder and self-harm had been exacerbated by harmful online content
content:
The mother of the murdered teenager Brianna Ghey has urged Keir Starmer to ban social media for under-16s, adding to growing pressure on the prime minister before a crunch vote on the issue on Wednesday.
Esther Ghey wrote to Starmer on Monday explain... [3366 chars]

title: Badenoch warns Tory MPs about people trying to ‘undermine party from within’
description: Conservative leader says staffers are briefing against party, in lengthy letter after Robert Jenrick’s switch to Reform
content:
Robert Jenrick’s defection does not mean the Conservatives are moving towards the centre ground, Kemi Badenoch has told her MPs in a letter that warned about people seeking to “undermine the party from within”.
In a lengthy message to the MPs, seen b... [3413 chars]

title: Badenoch warns Tory MPs against plotting and psychodrama
description: All 116 Tory MPs have been ordered to a meeting on Monday night, after Nigel Farage imposed a deadline on further defections.
content:
Conservative Party leader Kemi Badenoch has warned her MPs against more plotting and "psychodrama" after two defections from the party in four days.
Former shadow justice secretary Robert Jenrick became the most senior Tory to move to Reform UK, afte... [2348 chars]

title: Police and paramedics swarm Greater Manchester beauty spot after woman attacked
content:
An investigation has been launched
Police and paramedics attended a beauty spot in north Manchester after a woman was attacked on Monday afternoon (January 19). The incident was reported in Boggart Hole Clough in Blackley at around 3.30pm.

title: GB News halted for breaking migrant update as Starmer handed biggest blow yet
description: The programme was interrupted for a breaking announcement on the migrant crisis.
content: Keir Starmer has been dealt his biggest blow yet as GB News was halted for a breaking update on the ongoing illegal migrant crisis. The programme was interrupted to announce that the number of illegal migrants arriving in the UK by small boat has off... [2385 chars]
